contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 17, 2001 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Third Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-contest-third-section
Entertainments Contest
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - Lucinda Gough (cornet) Newbridge. Prizes - 1st £150, 2nd £90, 3rd £60. 6 bands competed.
Aug. 11, 2015, 4:32 a.m. July 2, 2020, 12:21 p.m.
1 Blaenavon Town Band Bryn Davies
2 Newbridge Celynen Band Kevin Gibbs
3 Llanelli Band R. Owen
4 Abertillery & District Youth R. J. Gowing
5 Oakdale Silver Band Ron Probyn
6 Aberystwyth Youth Band Alan Phillips
Withdrawn Cross Keys Silver Band Kerry Bowden
Withdrawn Glynneath Silver Band William Cross
